name: mistranslation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a word, document, etc. that is translated (= changed into a different language) in a way that is not correct: The book is marred by sloppy research, including mistranslations of documents. This is, unfortunately, a mis-translation of the original Hebrew.
[ U ] the fact that a word, document, etc. is translated (= changed into a different language) in a way that is not correct: She focuses on the problems of translation and mistranslation. He was accused of misquotation, manipulation, and mis-translation. Related words
translation
mistranslate
More examplesFewer examplesOmissions or mistranslations of key words and phrases led to incomprehensible text.He said that the report contained deliberate falsehoods as well as mistranslations of underlying documents.
